cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 4-bed mixed dorms room with shared facilities | 2 Bunk Beds | Bedside Tables | Lockers | Power + USB points | Air Conditioning | Linen | Free Wi-Fi | Shared kitchen | Free Parking.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 4-bed female only dorms room with shared facilities | 2 Bunk Beds | Bedside Tables | Lockers | Power + USB points | Air Conditioning | Linen | Free Wi-Fi | Shared kitchen | Free Parking.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private room with shared facilities | 2 Single Beds | Bedside Tables | Lockers | Power + USB points | Air Conditioning | Linen (Including Towel) | Free Wi-Fi | Shared kitchen | Free Parking.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 8th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 8th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
